>
[Gearblade](/Equipment.aspx?ID=896)
</title>

<spoilers>May contain spoilers from Agents of Edgewatch</spoilers>

<traits>
<trait label="Rare" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=137" />
<trait label="Clockwork" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=331" />
<trait label="Invested" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=98" />
<trait label="Magical" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=103" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Pathfinder #161: Belly of the Black Whale](/Sources.aspx?ID=51) pg. 79</row>

**Price** 13,000 gp

<row gap="medium">

**Usage** held in 1 or 2 hands

**Bulk** 2
</row>

<row gap="medium">
**Base Weapon** [Bastard Sword](/Weapons.aspx?ID=15), [Greatsword](/Weapons.aspx?ID=24), [Longsword](/Weapons.aspx?ID=31), [Shortsword](/Weapons.aspx?ID=43), [Greatclub](/Weapons.aspx?ID=22)
</row>

<row gap="medium">

 

 

 
</row>

</column>

---

Shaped like a blade made from spinning gears, this _+2 [greater striking](/Equipment.aspx?ID=280) weapon_ can catch enemy weapons and grind up foes. In order to function, the _gearblade_ must be wound for 10 minutes once every 24 hours. During this process, you can reconfigure the weapon to transform into a [bastard sword](/Weapons.aspx?ID=15), [greatsword](/Weapons.aspx?ID=24), [longsword](/Weapons.aspx?ID=31), or [shortsword](/Weapons.aspx?ID=43). It then gains all the features of the chosen weapon except that its Bulk is always 2 and it gains the [disarm](/Traits.aspx?ID=175) weapon trait and the [versatile B](/Traits.aspx?ID=200) weapon trait (which replaces any other versatile trait the weapon might have). If you don't wind the _gearblade_, it becomes inert and has the statistics of a [greatclub](/Weapons.aspx?ID=22).
